metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12481 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The find_option function in option.cc in Ledger 3.1.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: ledger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
